languages.text: "Ну, или... Иди вниз, если кишка не тонка. Может, и ты обессмертишься. Я бы пошла, но я — чокнутая, не советую следовать моему примеру". {n}На губах женщины играет слабая улыбка.{/n} "Закурить-то дашь?"

"Or... you can go down there, if you have the guts. Maybe you'll immortalise yourself too. That's what I would do, but I'm insane, so I'm not the best example to follow." {n}A weak smile dances on the woman's lips.{/n} "So. About that lho-stick?"
languages.original_text: "Ну, или... Иди вниз, если кишка не тонка. Может, и ты обессмертишься. Я бы пошла, но я — чокнутая, не советую следовать моему примеру". {n}На губах женщины играет слабая улыбка.{/n} "Закурить-то дашь?"

traits.locale_text: "Or... Go down, if you have guts. Maybe you'll be granted immortality, too. I'd go, but since I'm bonkers, I advise against following in my footsteps." {n}A weak smile dances on the woman's lips.{/n} "Would you give me a cigarette?"

"Or... Go down, if you have guts. Maybe you'll be granted immortality, too. I'd go, but since I'm bonkers, I advise against following in my footsteps." {n}A weak smile dances on the woman's lips.{/n} "Would you give me a cigarette?"

"Or... Go down, if you have the guts. Maybe you'll be granted immortality too. I'd go, but since I'm bonkers, I advise against following in my footsteps." {n}A weak smile dances on the woman's lips.{/n} "Would you give me a cigarette?"

"Or... Go down, if you have the guts. Maybe you'll be granted immortality too. I'd go, but since I'm bonkers, I advise against following in my footsteps." {n}A weak smile dances on the woman's lips.{/n} "Would you give me a cigarette?"

"Or... you can go down there, if you have the guts. Maybe you'll immortalise yourself too. That's what I would do, but I'm insane, so I'm not the best example to follow." {n}A weak smile dances on the woman's lips.{/n} "So. About that cigarette?"

"Or... you can go down there, if you have the guts. Maybe you'll immortalise yourself too. That's what I would do, but I'm insane, so I'm not the best example to follow." {n}A weak smile dances on the woman's lips.{/n} "So. About that lho-stick?"

languages.text: « Sinon... descendez, si vous en avez le cran. Vous vous immortaliserez peut-être, vous aussi. C'est ce que je ferais, mais seulement parce que je suis cinglée, alors on ne peut pas dire que je sois le meilleur exemple à suivre, {n}dit-elle en esquissant un faible sourire.{/n} Bon, et cette cigarette ? »
languages.original_text: "Or... you can go down there, if you have the guts. Maybe you'll immortalise yourself too. That's what I would do, but I'm insane, so I'm not the best example to follow." {n}A weak smile dances on the woman's lips.{/n} "So. About that cigarette?"

traits.locale_text: « Sinon... descendez, si vous en avez le cran. Vous vous immortaliserez peut-être, vous aussi. C'est ce que je ferais, mais seulement parce que je suis cinglée, alors on ne peut pas dire que je sois le meilleur exemple à suivre, {n}dit-elle en esquissant un faible sourire.{/n} Bon, et cette cigarette ? »

languages.text: «O... baje si tiene lo que hay que tener. A lo mejor hasta consigue la inmortalidad. Yo lo haría, pero yo estoy loca, así que yo que usted no seguiría mi ejemplo». {n}Una débil sonrisa baila en los labios de la mujer.{/n} «¿Y bien? ¿Me da un cigarro?».
languages.original_text: "Or... you can go down there, if you have the guts. Maybe you'll immortalise yourself too. That's what I would do, but I'm insane, so I'm not the best example to follow." {n}A weak smile dances on the woman's lips.{/n} "So. About that cigarette?"

traits.locale_text: «O... baje si tiene lo que hay que tener. A lo mejor hasta le conceden la inmortalidad. Iría yo misma, pero, viendo la mala cara que tengo, yo que usted no seguiría mi ejemplo». {n}Una débil sonrisa baila en los labios de la mujer.{/n} «¿Me da un cigarrito?».

languages.text: “或者……你要是有胆量的话，你大可以下去，说不定你也会永垂不朽。如果换做是我，我肯定会去，但考虑到我是个疯子，你最好还是不要步我的后尘。”{n}女人露出了虚弱的笑容。{/n}“可以给我根烟吗？”
languages.original_text: "Or... you can go down there, if you have the guts. Maybe you'll immortalise yourself too. That's what I would do, but I'm insane, so I'm not the best example to follow." {n}A weak smile dances on the woman's lips.{/n} "So. About that cigarette?"

traits.locale_text: “或者……你要是有胆量的话，就下去吧，说不定你也会永垂不朽。如果换做是我，我肯定会去，但既然我变成了这个样子，我建议你还是不要步我的后尘。”{n}女人露出了虚弱的笑容。{/n}“可以给我根烟吗？”

languages.text: 「あるいは…勇気があるなら、降りてみるといいさ。もしかしたら不老不死も手に入るかもしれない。私ならそうするけど、私は気が狂ってるからね。見習うべきじゃあないよ」{n}彼女の唇に弱々しい笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「タバコをくれないか？」
languages.original_text: "Or... you can go down there, if you have the guts. Maybe you'll immortalise yourself too. That's what I would do, but I'm insane, so I'm not the best example to follow." {n}A weak smile dances on the woman's lips.{/n} "So. About that cigarette?"

traits.locale_text: 「あるいは…勇気があるなら、降りてみるといいさ。もしかしたら不老不死も手に入るかもしれない。私も行きたいけど、私は気が狂ってるからね、足跡をたどるのは、やめたほうがいいよ」{n}彼女の唇に弱々しい笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「タバコをくれないか？」

languages.text: "Oder ... Ihr geht da runter, wenn Ihr Euch traut. Vielleicht macht Ihr Euch ja auch unsterblich. Das würde ich tun, aber nachdem ich verrückt bin, gebe ich wohl kein gutes Vorbild ab." {n}Ein schwaches Lächeln umspielt die Lippen der Frau.{/n} "Also. Was ist jetzt mit dieser Zigarette?"
languages.original_text: "Or... you can go down there, if you have the guts. Maybe you'll immortalise yourself too. That's what I would do, but I'm insane, so I'm not the best example to follow." {n}A weak smile dances on the woman's lips.{/n} "So. About that cigarette?"

traits.locale_text: "Oder ... Geht hinunter, wenn Ihr Euch traut. Vielleicht gewährt man Euch auch die Unsterblichkeit. Ich würde gehen, aber ich bin auch völlig durchgeknallt. Ich würde also davon abraten, in meine Fußstapfen zu treten." {n}Ein schwaches Lächeln spielt um die Lippen der Frau.{/n} "Würdet Ihr mir bitte eine Zigarette geben?"
